verses.name: Proverbs 23:19
verses.text: Hear thou, my son, and be wise, and guide thine heart in the way.

verses.name: Proverbs 23:20
verses.text: Be not among winebibbers; among riotous eaters of flesh:

verses.name: Proverbs 23:21
verses.text: For the drunkard and the glutton shall come to poverty: and drowsiness shall clothe a man with rags.

verses.name: Proverbs 23:22
verses.text: Hearken unto thy father that begat thee, and despise not thy mother when she is old.

verses.name: Proverbs 23:23
verses.text: Buy the truth, and sell it not; also wisdom, and instruction, and understanding.

verses.name: Proverbs 23:24
verses.text: The father of the righteous shall greatly rejoice: and he that begetteth a wise child shall have joy of him.
